snippet.title: Defector | OC5 Trailer | Oculus Rift
snippet.description:
Visit https://ocul.us/DefectorTrailer to learn more about Twisted Pixel’s VR spy thriller, Defector. Coming soon, only on Oculus Rift. Subscribe now to watch the latest VR game trailers and stay up to date on all things Rift.
 
Become the ultimate superspy in VR. Engage in undercover espionage, intense interrogations, and lethal hand-to-hand combat. Face off against death-defying challenges around the world—from aerial escapes at 30,000 feet to pulse-pounding rooftop chases in India.

Deploy every gadget and weapon in your arsenal to bring down enemies, from smart bombs to cybernetic gauntlets. Branching-path gameplay leads to mission success… or a fate worse than death. Will you go in guns blazing or take the stealth route?
 
Risk everything. Fear nothing.
Defector.

Learn more about Twisted Pixel:
Website: http://twistedpixelgames.com/games/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TwistedPixelGames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/twistedpixelgames
 
Buy Rift: https://www.oculus.com/rift
Follow Oculus Rift on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OculusRift
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OculusRift
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/oculusrift
